name: Vroomba
description:
Vroomba is a toy where the player controls a Vacuum-Kart. With this vehicle explore a kid's room where you can clean up all the dust. What is the cause of all this dust?

The Dust Balls! Little entites that drop little dust particles that fuels the vehicle. Use this fuel to propel yourself at full speed around the room.

I have left our Game Design document within the download folder for anyone that's interested in our Design. Enjoy!
